item.title: Emaar、Citystars 签署埃及红海度假村开发协议
item.description: 埃及政府表示，Emaar Misr 和 Citystars Properties 就埃及红海的开发项目签署了一项价值 9000 亿英镑（185 亿美元）的协议，因为这个北非国家一直在吸引海湾投资者的兴趣。【原文：Emaar Misr and Citystars Properties signed a deal for a development on Egypt’s Red Sea amounting to 900 billion pounds ($18.5 billion), the government said, as the North African nation keeps drawing interest from Gulf investors.】

item.title: 瞩目科技交易创纪录的首席执行官们齐聚高盛重要会议
item.description: 首席执行官、投资者、分析师甚至一些银行家本周将齐聚旧金山，参加科技行业最盛大的峰会之一，他们可能会花时间窃窃私语，谈论 2025 年将如何成为他们所在行业有史以来交易量最大的一年。【原文：CEOs, investors, analysts and even some bankers gathering for one of the tech industry’s biggest summits this week in San Francisco will likely spend time whispering about how 2025 could go down as the best year ever for deals in their sector.】

item.title: 看涨国债交易员等待就业修正和通胀数据
item.description: 本周，国债市场上胆大的投资者将面临通胀报告和就业数据基准修正对看涨情绪的考验。【原文：Emboldened investors in the Treasuries market face a test of bullish sentiment this week from inflation reports and a benchmark revisions for jobs data.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》称中国将向俄罗斯能源企业重新开放债券市场
item.description: 英国《金融时报》援引两位熟知内情的人士的话报道称，中国正着手恢复与俄罗斯顶级能源公司的国内债券市场，这表明中国与莫斯科的经济和外交关系更加紧密。【原文：China is moving to resume its domestic bond market with top Russian energy companies, signaling closer economic and diplomatic ties with Moscow, the Financial Times reported citing two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 加纳聘请毕马威会计师事务所为其电信业务提供咨询以结束亏损
item.description: 加纳已聘请会计师事务所毕马威（KPMG）就其对 AT 加纳有限公司（AT Ghana Ltd. ）和 Telecel 集团旗下一家公司的投资提供咨询意见，以期在其无线行业创建第二家强大的运营商。【原文：Ghana has hired accounting firm KPMG to advise on its investments in AT Ghana Ltd. and a unit of Telecel Group, with the view of creating a second strong operator in its wireless industry.】

item.title: S&P 公司警告再保险公司在巨灾风险升级时提供保护
item.description: 随着自然灾害越来越频繁，破坏性越来越大，旨在帮助弥补损失的一个关键支持措施变得越来越难以获得。【原文：As natural catastrophes become more frequent and destructive, a key backstop intended to help cover losses has gotten harder to access.】

item.title: 美联储主席最终人选哈塞特支持 "任务蠕变 "批评
item.description: 美联储主席的热门候选人凯文-哈塞特（Kevin Hassett）说，美国中央银行超出其职责范围的扩张危及了其独立性和公信力。【原文：Kevin Hassett, a top candidate for Federal Reserve chair, said the US central bank put its independence and credibility in jeopardy by expanding beyond its mandate.】

item.title: 英国内政大臣将主持边境安全五眼会议
item.description: 英国本周将接待来自盟国的部长们，以制定新的措施，遏制走私团伙，减少非法毒品的扩散。【原文：The UK this week will host ministers from allied countries to develop new measures that will curb smuggling gangs and reduce the spread of illegal drugs.】

item.title: 特朗普家族在数周内增加了 13 亿美元的加密货币财富
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的家族仅用了几个星期的时间，就从两家成立不到一年的加密企业中赚取了约 13 亿美元。【原文：It took just a few eventful weeks for President Donald Trump’s family to rack up about $1.3 billion from two crypto ventures, each less than a year old.】

item.title: 捷克央行行长认为将长期采取紧缩政策应对价格风险
item.description: 捷克央行副行长伊娃-扎姆拉齐洛娃（Eva Zamrazilova）表示，捷克央行需要在较长时间内保持货币政策的限制性，以应对经济中持续存在的通胀风险。【原文：The Czech central bank needs to keep monetary policy restrictive for a longer period of time to address persistent inflation risks in the economy, according to Deputy Governor Eva Zamrazilova.】

item.title: 安哥拉计划在第四季度开放下一轮石油许可证发放
item.description: 安哥拉计划在第四季度开放下一轮石油开采许可，作为将原油日产量保持在100万桶以上的努力的一部分。【原文：Angola plans to open its next oil-licensing round by the fourth quarter, as part of an effort keep crude production above 1 million barrels per day.】

item.title: 乔盖蒂表示，意大利预算不会要求公民做出牺牲
item.description: 意大利财政部长吉安卡洛-乔盖蒂（Giancarlo Giorgetti）表示，意大利今年的预算法不会要求公民做出任何牺牲，并强调国民账户符合政府的预期。【原文：Italy’s budget law this year will not require any sacrifices of citizens, the country’s Finance Minister Giancarlo Giorgetti said, stressing that national accounts were in line with the government’s expectations.】

item.title: 匈牙利大选进入白热化阶段，欧尔班的竞争对手公布税收政策
item.description: 匈牙利主要反对党在一次竞选集会上介绍了其新的经济政策负责人，并将税制改革作为挑战总理维克托-欧尔班长期统治地位的核心。【原文：Hungary’s main opposition party put tax reform at the center of a challenge to Prime Minister Viktor Orban’s long dominance, introducing its new economic policy head at a campaign rally.】

item.title: 伊拉克与埃克森公司就在亚洲及主要市场储存石油进行谈判
item.description: 伊拉克正在与埃克森美孚公司就其在亚洲和其他原油销售市场的石油储存问题进行谈判，因为伊拉克希望获得设施，以确保在危机时期继续向客户供应石油。【原文：Iraq is in talks with Exxon Mobil Corp. for oil storage in Asia and other markets where it sells crude, as it looks for access to facilities to ensure continued supply to customers during times of crisis.】

item.title: 交易员撇开通胀风险，押注平稳加息之路
item.description: 既然 9 月份的降息已经板上钉钉，期权专业人士预计股市将在周四的消费者物价指数读数中一帆风顺。但如果该指数显示通胀开始升温，这可能会成为一个危险的赌注。【原文：Now that a September rate cut is all but sealed, options pros are expecting smooth sailing in the stock market through Thursday’s consumer price index reading. But that could turn out to be a dangerous bet if it shows inflation starting to run hot.】

item.title: 欧佩克+"开始加速下一代石油供应的回归
item.description: 欧佩克+"同意在下个月再次增产，因为该组织在多年维护价格之后扩大了向更高产量的政策转变。【原文：OPEC+ agreed to increase production again next month, as the group extends a policy shift toward higher volumes after years of defending prices.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚内阁击退极右翼反对派的下台申请
item.description: 罗马尼亚政府在批准了旨在降低欧盟最大预算缺口的第二套改革措施后，经受住了极右翼反对派最近一次推翻政府的企图。【原文：Romania’s government survived the latest attempt by the far-right opposition to oust it after approving a second set of reforms aimed at lowering the widest budget shortfall in the European Union.】

item.title: 新兴市场抢滩债市，把握风险机遇
item.description: 发展中世界的国家和公司正以至少十年来最快的速度急于出售债券，利用投资者对新兴市场资产的高胃口发行债务，而投资者称全球债务市场未来可能出现更剧烈的波动。【原文：Countries and companies in the developing world are rushing to sell bonds at the fastest clip in at least a decade, taking advantage of high appetite for emerging-market assets to issue debt amid what investors say could be sharper swings ahead in global debt markets.】

item.title: 石破将离任，日本市场波动风险上升
item.description: 随着投资者为首相石破茂的离任以及下一任首相人选的猜测做准备，日本市场面临着更加不稳定的前景。【原文：Japanese markets face the prospect of more instability as investors prepare for the departure of Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba and the guessing game of who comes next.】

item.title: 苹果热销的新款 iPhone "Air "不会是大多数买家的正确选择
item.description: 苹果公司周二举行的盛大发布会的亮点将是其轻薄的 "iPhone 17 Air"—；但该设备并不适合大多数消费者购买。另外：该公司正计划推出 Perplexity 竞争对手，并继续尝试在中国推出人工智能功能。最后，iPad 版 Instagram 应用程序终于面世。【原文：The highlight of Apple’s big event on Tuesday will be its thin and light “iPhone 17 Air” — but the device won’t be the right purchase for most customers. Also: The company is planning a Perplexity rival and continues its attempt to launch AI features in China. Lastly, an Instagram app for the iPad finally arrives.】

item.title: 宏观对冲基金在特殊期权交易中进行指数对指数交易
item.description: 对直接下注不太感兴趣的投资者正在寻找衍生品领域的利基角落，在一个市场与另一个市场之间下注。【原文：Investors with less appetite for outright bets are looking to niche corners of the derivatives space to wager on one market against another.】

item.title: 泰国新总理的经验丰富的内阁人选可能让投资者放心
item.description: 泰国新总理阿努丁-占维拉库（Anutin Charnvirakul）的主要内阁人选可能会被投资者视为一个令人放心的信号，因为长期以来，泰国频繁的政治动荡一直令投资者感到沮丧。【原文：New Thai Prime Minister Anutin Charnvirakul’s key cabinet choices may be seen as a reassuring signal by investors who have long been frustrated by the nation’s frequent bouts of political turmoil.】

item.title: 分析师称石叶辞职后日本多头债券和日元将下跌
item.description: 日本首相石破茂在第二次全国大选受挫后表示将辞职，据分析师称，日本较长期限的债务可能会进一步下跌，日元将在周一开市时走软。【原文：Japan’s longer-maturity debt will likely fall further and the yen will weaken when markets open on Monday, according to analysts, after Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba said he will resign following a second national election setback.】

item.title: EToro 联合创始人称其拥有现金，可瞄准更雄心勃勃的并购目标
item.description: EToro Group Ltd.的一位创始人表示，该公司已准备好开展更多雄心勃勃的并购交易，而且拥有足够的现金。【原文：EToro Group Ltd. is ready to undertake more ambitious M&A deals, and has the cash to do so, one of its founders said.】

item.title: 法国政治混乱给股票和债券带来 "长期 "风险
item.description: 对投资者而言，法国政局不稳带来的风险远不止周一的议会信任投票，届时弗朗索瓦-巴伊鲁很可能失去总理职位。【原文：For investors, the risk from France’s unstable politics lies beyond Monday’s confidence vote in Parliament, when François Bayrou is likely to lose his premiership.】

item.title: S.韩国在贷款问题上推出更多房地产降温措施
item.description: 韩国推出了控制房地产价格的新措施，此前的措施未能充分冷却需求，并引发了央行对抵押贷款债务水平不断攀升的担忧。【原文：South Korea rolled out new steps to rein in property prices, after earlier measures failed to cool demand sufficiently and spurred central bank concerns over mounting mortgage debt levels.】

item.title: 孟加拉国中央银行旨在将储备金增至 400 亿美元
item.description: 孟加拉国央行行长阿赫桑-H-曼苏尔（Ahsan H. Mansur）表示，孟加拉国央行正努力在 6 月财政年度结束前将储备金提高到约 400 亿美元，以稳定汇率。【原文：Bangladesh’s central bank is working to boost its reserves to about $40 billion by the end of the fiscal year in June in an effort to stabilize its exchange rate, Governor Ahsan H. Mansur said.】

item.title: 中国央行将黄金购买热潮延长至 10 个月
item.description: 中国人民银行在 8 月份连续第 10 个月增持黄金，继续推动黄金储备多元化，使其远离美元。【原文：The People’s Bank of China increased its gold holdings in August for a 10th month, in a continued push to diversify its reserves away from US dollars.】

item.title: 卢拉说巴西不会允许外国政府干预
item.description: 路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦总统说，巴西有能力在没有外来干涉的情况下治理自己，并批评了那些鼓励 "攻击 "国家的地方政客。【原文：President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva said Brazil is capable of governing itself without foreign interference, and criticized local politicians who are encouraging “attacks” on the nation.】

item.title: 莫迪-习近平握手、减税政策提振落后的印度股市
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）在中国与国家主席习近平进行了象征性的握手，加上印度国内的新减税政策，这些都让人乐观地认为，印度股市最终将缩小与新兴市场同类股市的差距。【原文：Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s symbolic handshake with President Xi Jinping in China, combined with fresh tax cuts at home, is fueling optimism that Indian equities will finally narrow the gap with their emerging-market peers.】
